name: Zombieblatz by Grenadeware
description:
We are new at game development and will really appreciate support :) We are trying to earn some much-needed income. 

Zombieblatz is a mountainous, sectioned large terrain which is very eerie and dark. The player needs to try and survive from being attacked by fast zombies while searching for the win zone which is not easy to find. Good fun for people who like dark and creepy first-person shooting and survival games.
